summary: The exposure to popular culture may help create and reinforce cultural stereotypes regarding gender, race, ethnicity, religion, nationality and class. Using a selection of films, plays and television shows, including variety shows and documentaries produced in the United States since the nineteenth century, students will explore ways in which popular culture exploits, supports and reinforces cultural stereotypes alongside ways in which it challenges and subverts them.
title: Playing Roles; from Uncle Remus to 30 Rock
